sec.div: 2.7. Determination of Ag + Concentration in an Aqueous Solution by N-CQDs
sec.p: The performance in the detection of Ag + in an aqueous solution was evaluated by fluorescence. Different concentrations of Ag + (0–30 μM) were added to the N-CQDs solutions (pH = 7), and the fluorescence was measured after reaction for 2 min.
